li.a: How to Enroll and Required Documents

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Friday, April 3, 2020 Dear Lemoore Union Elementary School District Families,
As we come to the end of our third week of school closure, I realize the information related to the COVID-19 pandemic has been overwhelming. It is dynamic and constantly evolving. As I shared previously, we will continue to provide critical updates as a means to ensure our families...
READ MORE >

Please take notice that the Governing Boards of the Lemoore Union Elementary and High School Districts (Boards) will conduct public hearings to consider the adoption of a Development Fee Justification Study and a proposed increase of their Level 1 school facilities fees. The Lemoore Union Elementary School District Board will hold its hearing at the Board meeting...

div.a: Kings County Superintendents School Extended Closure Letter

div.p:
March 27, 2020 ~ 9:00 AMKings County Community:Earlier this month, Kings County school district superintendents, with the support of their boards of trustees and in consultation with the local public health department, made the decision to temporarily close our schools due to the COVID-19 outbreak. Since then, we have remained in constant contact with one another,...
READ MORE >

Friday, March 27, 2020 Dear Lemoore Union Elementary School District Families,
As we come to the end of our second week of school closure, we continue to think of EACH ONE of our LUESD families during this challenging time. As you can understand the COVID-19 pandemic is dynamic and evolving. As I shared previously, we remain strong and vigilant in providing...
READ MORE >

Dear Lemoore Union Elementary School District Families, As we end our first week of school closure, I hope this communication finds you and your family doing well. Over the course of last week our state and nation have dealt with so many updates and challenges as we navigate the COVID-19 pandemic. Those changes have impacted our district, however, we remain...
READ MORE >

Thank you for your patience while we work to provide support to our students during this challenging time. As a reminder, these are recommended daily schedules and are voluntary for students and families to complete.
READ MORE >

Dear Lemoore Union Elementary School District Parents and Community, Our district leadership team has been working hard to support the next steps as part of our school district closure. First, we are providing a lunch meal for students beginning on Wednesday, March 18th. These will be available on a drive through/walk up basis from 10:30am-12:00pm. Meals are...
READ MORE >

🥗 During the COVID-19 school closures, LUESD is offering a free lunch to all children under 18-years old beginning Wednesday, March 18th. Children must be present to receive a lunch. 🥗 Durante el cierre de la escuelas COVID-19, LUESD ofrece un lonche gratis a todos los niños menores de 18 años a partir del miércoles 18 de marzo. Los niños deben estar presentes...

img.alt: Kings County Superintendents School Closure Letter

div.a: Kings County Superintendents School Closure Letter

div.p:
March 13, 2020
Kings County Community:
The 2019 novel coronavirus (COVID-19) has caused great anxiety in our schools and communities. While local health officials have yet to confirm a case of community transmission, we do not yet know how this will ultimately impact our county. Simply put, we are dealing with the unknown, and the time has come for us...
READ MORE >

The Lemoore Union School District continues to assess the constant changes and status of the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19) in California. The heightened awareness of this virus has led the District to implement precautionary measures for cleanliness, such as increasing the frequency of disinfecting counter tops, doorknobs, light switches, and other...
READ MORE >

You are invited to share coffee and conversation with LUESD Superintendent Cheryl Hunt. This is an open opportunity for parents to meet informally to share ideas to support academic success for all students and discuss the latest topics and goals impacting LUESD and public education. All parents are welcome to attend. Hope to see you there! SCHEDULE ...

LUESD ANNOUNCES PARTNERSHIP WITH PURPOSITY! It’s now simple to make a difference for our students, right from your phone! With @Purposity get one weekly notification, read the story of a neighbor in need, and decide if you want to help, all from your phone in under a minute. img.alt: IMPORTANT REMINDERS ABOUT INTERNET SAFETY FOR STUDENTS

div.a: IMPORTANT REMINDERS ABOUT INTERNET SAFETY FOR STUDENTS

div.p:
Along with offering new ways to connect with the world, online activities also come with risks, including cyberbullying, exposure to inappropriate material, online predators and revealing too much personal information. We encourage parents to have intentional conversations with their children about what they encounter online. These discussions could...
